tool.name: GromppMdrun
tool.description: : Wrapper of the GROMACS grompp module and the GROMACS mdrun module.

param.name: input_gro_path
param.label: input GRO file
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS structure GRO file. Format: [input].gro

param.name: input_top_zip_path
param.label: input ZIP file
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS topology TOP and ITP files in zip format. Format: [input].zip

param.name: input_cpt_path
param.label: input CPT file
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS checkpoint file CPT. Format: [input].cpt

param.name: input_ndx_path
param.label: input NDX file
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS index files NDX. Format: [input].ndx

param.name: input_mdp_path
param.label: input MDP file
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS MDP file. Format: [input].mdp

param.name: outname_output_trr_path
param.label: output TRR name
param.help: Path to the GROMACS uncompressed raw trajectory file TRR Format: [output].trr

param.name: outname_output_gro_path
param.label: output GRO name
param.help: Path to the output GROMACS structure GRO file Format: [output].gro

param.name: outname_output_edr_path
param.label: output EDR name
param.help: Path to the output GROMACS portable energy file EDR Format: [output].edr

param.name: outname_output_log_path
param.label: output LOG name
param.help: Path to the output GROMACS trajectory log file LOG Format: [output].log

param.name: outname_output_xtc_path
param.label: output XTC name
param.help: Path to the GROMACS compressed trajectory file XTC Format: [output].xtc

param.name: outname_output_cpt_path
param.label: output CPT name
param.help: Path to the output GROMACS checkpoint file CPT Format: [output].cpt

param.name: outname_output_dhdl_path
param.label: output XVG name
param.help: Path to the output dhdl.xvg file only used when free energy calculation is turned on Format: [output].xvg

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: mdp
param.label: mdp
param.help: MDP options specification. (Json)

param.name: simulation_type
param.label: simulation_type
param.help: Default options for the mdp file. Each creates a different mdp file.
param.option: minimization - Energy minimization using steepest descent algorithm is used
nvt - substance N Volume V and Temperature T are conserved
npt - substance N pressure P and Temperature T are conserved
free - No design constraints applied; Free MD
index - Creates an empty mdp file

param.name: maxwarn
param.label: maxwarn
param.help: Maximum number of allowed warnings.

param.name: mpi_bin
param.label: mpi_bin
param.help: Path to the MPI runner. Usually "mpirun" or "srun".

param.name: mpi_np
param.label: mpi_np
param.help: Number of MPI processes. Usually an integer bigger than 1.

param.name: mpi_hostlist
param.label: mpi_hostlist
param.help: Path to the MPI hostlist file.

param.name: checkpoint_time
param.label: checkpoint_time
param.help: Checkpoint writing interval in minutes. Only enabled if an output_cpt_path is provided.

param.name: use_gpu
param.label: use_gpu
param.help: Use settings appropriate for GPU. Adds: -nb gpu -pme gpu

param.name: gpu_id
param.label: gpu_id
param.help: List of unique GPU device IDs available to use.

param.name: gpu_tasks
param.label: gpu_tasks
param.help: List of GPU device IDs, mapping each PP task on each node to a device.

param.name: gmx_lib
param.label: gmx_lib
param.help: Path set GROMACS GMXLIB environment variable.

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: Path to the GROMACS executable binary.
